name: Hot Lemon Tea
history: Hot Lemon Tea is a widely consumed beverage around the world, known for its simple preparation and soothing properties. It's often consumed for its potential health benefits, including vitamin C intake and relief from cold symptoms.
description: Hot Lemon Tea is a comforting and easy-to-make drink, consisting of hot water, fresh lemon juice, and often sweetened with honey or sugar. It's appreciated for its citrusy flavor and is a popular choice for relaxation or as a home remedy for colds.

instructions.title: Boil Water
instructions.description: Boil 1 cup of water in a kettle or pot.

instructions.title: Prepare Lemon
instructions.description: Cut the lemon in half and squeeze the juice of half the lemon into a teacup.

instructions.title: Combine and Serve
instructions.description: Pour the hot water over the lemon juice in the cup. Sweeten with honey or sugar to taste. Stir well.

tips: Adjust the amount of lemon juice to suit your taste preferences.
Adding a slice of ginger can provide an additional flavor and potential health benefits.
variations: Include a tea bag of your choice (like green or herbal tea) for added flavor.
Add spices such as cinnamon or cloves for a warming effect.

storage.instructions: Not recommended for storage as the lemon flavor is best enjoyed fresh.

presentationTips: Serve with a slice of lemon on the rim of the cup for an elegant presentation.
Accompany with a small spoon or stirrer.
